articles.title: New paper on Learning Mean Field Game
articles.author: Renyuan Xu
articles.content: We have a new submission on reinforcement learning for mean field game. Please have a look at https://arxiv.org/pdf/1901.09585.pdf.

articles.title: Congratulate Xinyu Li for her postdoctoral position
articles.content: Congratulate Xinyu Li for her postdoctoral position, starting September 2025 at the Department of Mathematics, University of Oxford.

articles.title: Welcome back Renyuan Xu to the bay area
articles.content: Welcome back Renyuan Xu to the bay area for her new career adventure as a tenure track assistant professor at MS&E department, Stanford University, starting September 2025.

articles.title: Acknowledgment of generous gift fund from QRT
articles.content: We acknowledge and appreciate the generous gift fund from Qube Research & Technologies (QRT).
